title: Define Haptic Feedback System Design
description: Design a haptic feedback system to simulate tactile sensations for users interacting with holographic objects.

title: Develop Holographic Object Generation Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm for generating realistic and high-resolution holographic objects.

title: Implement Tactile Sensor Integration
description: Integrate tactile sensors into the system to capture and interpret user interactions.

title: Develop User Interface for Holographic Object Manipulation
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for users to manipulate holographic objects.

title: Create Haptic Feedback System Prototype
description: Build a working prototype of the haptic feedback system for user testing.

title: Perform User Testing and Gather Feedback
description: Conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on the prototype and identify areas for improvement.

title: Iterate on Design Based on User Feedback
description: Revise the design based on user feedback and refine the haptic feedback system.
dependencies: Perform User Testing and Gather Feedback

title: Implement Revised Haptic Feedback System
description: Update the haptic feedback system according to design revisions.
dependencies: Iterate on Design Based on User Feedback

title: Repeat User Testing and Gather Additional Feedback
description: Conduct additional user testing sessions to validate the revised design.

title: Document Final Design and Development Process
description: Write detailed documentation on the final design and development process of the TactileHolographicInterface.
